page.title: 06LOCAL NEWS FOR BROSELEY
page.content: The local paper for this area is the Bridgnorth Journal. In the issue for Friday September 27th was a report that Alan Rye, a local builder, wants to rebuild the{Pritchard Memorial}in Broseley High Street.The original was built in 1862 to commemorate George Pritchard. It was demolished in the mid 1940's. Mr Rye's plan has roused mixed feelings in the town. Pupils at the Church of England Primary School were treated to a display of juggling, music,and fun by {The Fabulous Salami Brothers}last week. The Salamis popped into the school before their concert at the Broseley Social Club. {Broseley Red Cross Society}are asking for new members to learn first aid and accident prevention.
